author: arj
msg: Build.xml now uses its own security policy file for testing rather than the production version in etc. The build file also copies the webapp 2.3 DTD to the WAR.

author: arj
msg: Deprecation: the built-in Role.ALL enum has been eliminated. Use com.ecyrd.jspwiki.auth.GroupPrincipal in jspwiki.properties instead.

author: arj
msg: Enhancement: the JSPWiki security policy now supports permission grants to wiki group principals (GroupPrincipal). In addition, a new Permission class, auth.permissions.AllPermission, grants administrative rights to specific wikis (or all, with the wildcard). The combination of these two enhancements means that wiki groups can now possess administrative rights. See the security policy for a sample grant block.
